questions.prompt: A friend texts a 10/10 urgent ask.

options.label: I drop everything to help.
I delay replying until it feels less intense.
I acknowledge, set a boundary, propose a time.
I turn the charm up and drive the convo.
I feel self-conscious and hang back.
I stay steady, ask thoughtful questions.
I brainstorm plays and message stakeholders now.
I binge more news and feel scattered.
I map risks, gate decisions, and brief the team.
I snap, then regret the tone.
I smile it off and shut down inside.
I name it and reset norms.
I jump in to energize the room.
I drift into daydreams.
I suggest a process tweak.

questions.prompt: Notifications go wild while you’re deep in work.

options.label: I start rapid-fire replying.
I mute everything and forget to return later.
I batch them for a set window.
I confront it head-on, strong stance.
I steer to a lighter topic.
I facilitate a structured resolution.
I ride the high and take on more.
I deflect and change the subject.
I thank them and capture what worked.
I overcorrect aggressively.
I hide and hope it blows over.
I own it, fix it, add a check.

questions.prompt: A risky, brilliant idea hits you.

options.label: I pitch it immediately.
I shelve it “for later” and it fades.
I run a quick test before sharing.

questions.prompt: A close colleague cancels last minute.

options.label: I feel irritated and fire off a sharp reply.
I say “no worries” but lose steam for the day.
I reset expectations and re-plan my time.

questions.prompt: You’re learning something hard and keep failing.

options.label: I push harder and force a breakthrough.
I bounce to something easier.
I slow down, follow the steps, try again.

questions.prompt: You’re asked an unexpected question on stage.

options.label: I answer boldly, even if half-formed.
I dodge to another point.
I pause, reframe, then respond.

questions.prompt: End of a long day, one important task remains.

options.label: I power through on will alone.
I procrastinate with “just one video.”
I take 5 minutes to reset, then complete.

questions.prompt: A friend shares a strong opposing view.

options.label: I debate vigorously.
I keep the peace and move on.
I get curious and set a container for the convo.

accelerator.title: Accelerator
accelerator.summary: You surge toward intensity and create forward motion.
accelerator.exalted: Directed power: fast, clean, reliable under pressure.
accelerator.practice_preview: Use the 6-second gap before big moves.

stabilizer.title: Stabilizer
stabilizer.summary: You hold intensity with standards and structure.

defuser.title: Defuser
defuser.summary: You diffuse intensity and de-escalate the field.
defuser.practice_preview: Set a 25/5 box and do the next tiny action.
